Name: Raindancer
About the game: Awoken from death by The Rain itself, Bramble is tasked with bringing an end to the leaders of three rival tribes, and purifying their corruption against nature. Raindancer is a ONE-HIT-DEATH boss-rush action adventure with local co-op play. Challenge your gaming skills on a journey set in a beautiful hand-painted world. With fast-paced yet simple to learn combat, reaction time is paramount to your success. Raindancer can be played with Mouse & Keyboard or a Gamepad. Gamepad controls are similar to a twin-stick shooter , using the left stick to move and the right stick to aim. Features Engage in five unique battles, each with a distinct increased difficulty encounter. Equip Blessings from defeated enemies to change your character's playstyle. Share the challenge in 2 player local co-op. Explore the hand-painted world and its monstrous inhabitants, illustrated by Vincent Van Hoof. Experience the dynamic soundtrack and soundscapes by composer Julian Crowhurst.
